title: 1926 Auburn
description: A humorous coming-of-age novel set in the Depression era about a young man, Dave Harris, seeking his own path to success. He finds that helping his uncle to turn around a failing luncheonette feeds his ambition to found a labor union and make a hit movie with his three girlfriends and a bunch of local hoods. Its a fun read filled with wonderful nostalgic details capturing the spirit of Brooklyn in the 1930s.
author: Jack Greenbaum
